snippet: The agencies said Friday that more than 800,000 people in northern Mali needed immediate food aid and that three million people nationwide were at risk.
abstract: Aid groups are warning that northern Mali could soon be facing a serious food crisis unless more money is raised.
lead_paragraph: The agencies said Friday that more than 800,000 people in northern Mali needed immediate food aid and that three million people nationwide were at risk.

headline.main: Aid Groups Warn of Food Crisis in Mali
headline.print_headline: Mali: Aid Groups Warn of Food Crisis
